title: Ep 552 | How God's Timing Shocks Jase, Men Who Cook & How the Apostles Would Have Used Hot Spots
description:
Jase can't believe God chose to reveal the message of Jesus by word of mouth, knowing that a technological boom was right around the corner! Al talks about how many more men are becoming great cooks in our culture. Phil discusses the hot spot technology that the apostles would definitely have taken advantage of if they had it. Jase is joined in the studio by Ryan Lee and Gary Witherall to talk about the incredible weight and power of forgiveness and the rarely known joy that can be found in suffering.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://CovEyes.com/PHIL and get a 30 Day free trial with the promo code: PHIL
